data.current_summary: Get historical Spot prices for requested metals
data.current_description:
Historical OHLC data for the specified period and interval size 

The combination of the interval parameter and start and end dates can result in results
being truncated to conform to result size limits. See comments on interval parameter for details on valid interval values.
 
The historicalfx flag is used to determine whether to apply today's fx rates to a historical period, or to apply the historical rates from that same time frame.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves historical OHLC (Open, High, Low, Close) spot price data for specified metals over a defined period and interval. Accepts parameters: metal symbols, start/end dates, interval size, and historicalfx flag. The historicalfx flag determines whether to apply current or historical FX rates to the data. Results may be truncated if the date range and interval combination exceeds result size limits. Returns an IntervalCollectionResponse containing historical price intervals.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear but description needs restructuring for AI agent clarity. Reorganized to clearly separate inputs (symbols, dates, interval, historicalfx), explain the historicalfx behavior, mention truncation behavior, and specify the response type. This helps agents understand all parameters and their effects.

data.current_summary: Get historical Spot prices for requested metals
data.current_description:
Historical OHLC data for the specified period and interval size 

The combination of the interval parameter and start and end dates can result in results
being truncated to conform to result size limits. See comments on interval parameter for details on valid interval values.
 
The historicalfx flag is used to determine whether to apply today's fx rates to a historical period, or to apply the historical rates from that same time frame.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves historical OHLC (Open, High, Low, Close) spot price data for specified metals over a defined period and interval. Accepts parameters: metal symbols, start/end dates, interval size, and historicalfx flag. The historicalfx flag determines whether to apply current or historical FX rates to the data. Results may be truncated if the date range and interval combination exceeds result size limits. Returns an IntervalCollectionResponse containing historical price intervals.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear but description needs restructuring for AI agent clarity. Reorganized to clearly separate inputs (symbols, dates, interval, historicalfx), explain the historicalfx behavior, mention truncation behavior, and specify the response type. This helps agents understand all parameters and their effects.

data.current_summary: Get historical Spot prices for requested metals
data.current_description:
Historical OHLC data for the specified period and interval size 

The combination of the interval parameter and start and end dates can result in results
being truncated to conform to result size limits. See comments on interval parameter for details on valid interval values.
 
The historicalfx flag is used to determine whether to apply today's fx rates to a historical period, or to apply the historical rates from that same time frame.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves historical OHLC (Open, High, Low, Close) spot price data for specified metals over a defined period and interval. Accepts parameters: metal symbols, start/end dates, interval size, and historicalfx flag. The historicalfx flag determines whether to apply current or historical FX rates to the data. Results may be truncated if the date range and interval combination exceeds result size limits. Returns an IntervalCollectionResponse containing historical price intervals.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear but description needs restructuring for AI agent clarity. Reorganized to clearly separate inputs (symbols, dates, interval, historicalfx), explain the historicalfx behavior, mention truncation behavior, and specify the response type.
